page.title: 02Waters Upton: the village
page.content: {Waters Upton}is the main nucleated settlement of this area. It is located just east of the main A442 road running from Wellington in the south to Hodnet and Whitchurch to the north. The village was previously known as Walter's Upton, named after a Lord of the Manor in the 16th century. Essentially this is an agricultural community, although some dwellings have been bought by commuters working in{Telford},8kms to the south. The village has few services, notably a Post Office/General stores, Public House, and a garage on the main road serving passing traffic.
